generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending across the frame, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the building on the right side of the image, with a pedestrian walking on it.
- building: A large stone building with multiple windows is prominently featured on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery visible in the background and along the left side of the road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing cloudy.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk near the building on the right side of the image.
- car: A black car is visible driving on the road in the middle of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible mounted on a pole on the right side of the image, near the building.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible mounted on a pole on the left side of the image, near the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- terrain: Some grassy terrain is visible in the background, behind the trees and buildings.
